description.value:
You can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.44UXH5FVH6EK2UI9]{Disuse Atrophy} cantrip at will. At 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.V4RW5MFB4N243CDA]{Open Wounds} spell once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.DS8BAOY19DVGW5SH]{Stupefy} spell once per long rest. 
You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
If you are a spellcaster, you can also add these spells to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
